thread.title_full: Man Utd v Hull City LIVE scores: And EPL results | Daily Mail Online

author: Dan Ripley For Mailonline
title: Man Utd v Hull City LIVE scores: And EPL results | Daily Mail Online
text: Manchester United 0-0 Hull, LIVE: Plus West Ham 0-4 Manchester City and Stoke City 1-1 Everton as it happens Manchester United and Manchester City hope to close in on top four rivals Red Devils host Hull City in one of three Premier League matches Kevin de Bruyne and David Silva score for Man City at West Ham United Gabriel Jesus netted his first City goal while Yaya Toure netted fourth Peter Crouch scored 100th Premier League goal to give Stoke lead over Everton But Ryan Shawcross equalising own goal brought Toffees at the bet 365 Stadium Premier League matches kick off from 8pm GMT, London Stadium from 7.45pm
